name: Apothecary (Source Code)
description:
Apothecary. You have herbs you don't know what they do, and patients that are sick. Try some herbs on them and experiment and see what works, but try not to kill them or let them die of their sicknesses.

Developed for Ludum Dare 43. If you could go to the Ludum Dare page, and rate it and provide feedback, that'd be awesome.

Creators:

  • Emily Cox: Research and Sound
  • Liam Dunstan: Programming
  • Sam Huffer (me): Programming
  • Burju Kocoglu: Art

This is the source code for Apothecary, not a playable build of the game. For a playable build, go to https://huf0001.itch.io/apothecary
